controller

Class ConferenceSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ConferenceSystem

  • public class ConferenceSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Conference System is the main class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConferenceSystem(java.lang.String sessionPath, boolean loadExample)
      Construct a Conference System, and try to load a session from the file specified by sessionPath, If load failed and loadExample is true, we load an example session specified by loadExampleSession(Session).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Session loadEmptySession(Session session)
      Load an empty session.
      Session loadExampleSession(Session session)
      Load the an example session.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Run the Conference System,
      void run()
      Run the conference, execute the LoginScreen.
      void save(java.lang.String sessionPath)
      Save the conference (saving the session), and close the TextIO.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConferenceSystem

        public ConferenceSystem(java.lang.String sessionPath,
                        boolean loadExample)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Construct a Conference System, and try to load a session from the file specified by sessionPath, If load failed and loadExample is true, we load an example session specified by loadExampleSession(Session). Otherwise we create load an empty session specified by loadEmptySession(Session).
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        See Also:
        loadExampleSession(Session), loadEmptySession(Session)

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Run the Conference System,
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the conference, execute the LoginScreen.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String sessionPath)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Save the conference (saving the session), and close the TextIO.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • loadEmptySession

        public Session loadEmptySession(Session session)
        Load an empty session. We need at least one organizer account! 
             The Empty Session contains the following:
     - 1 Organizer
       - Username : org1, Password : 1

      • loadExampleSession

        public Session loadExampleSession(Session session)
        Load the an example session. 
                         The Example session contains the following:
                 - 2 Organizer
                    - Username : org1, Password : 1
                    - Username : org2, Password : 2
                 - 3 Speaker
                    - Username : spk1, Password : 1
                    - Username : spk2, Password : 2
                    - Username : spk3, Password : 3
                 - 4 Attendee
                    - Username : att1, Password : 1
                    - Username : att2, Password : 2
                    - Username : att3, Password : 3
                    - Username : att4, Password : 4
                 - Some Events,
                    - Talk 1
                      - Organizer : org1
                      - Speaker : not set,
                      - Location : Convocation Hall
                      - Date : 2020/11/22
                      - Time : 10:00 ~ 11:00
                    - Talk 2
                      - Organizer : org1
                      - Speaker : not set,
                      - Location : Bahen Center
                      - Date : 2020/11/22
                      - Time : 13:00 ~ 14:00
                    - Talk 3
                      - Organizer : org1
                      - Speaker : not set,
                      - Location : Convocation Hall
                      - Date : 2020/11/22
                      - Time : 13:00 ~ 14:00
                    Notice that the Speaker of Talk 1 and Talk 2 can't
                    be the same, because they have the same time and different location.
